thread.title: Amy

author: Amy
title: Amy
text: first they forget to inform me that as soon as my bill date is due the take all the money out with im was fully aware that it would be similar to electric ireland were u could pay certain amount a week but of course i was wrong and not informed so ended up with a bill i couldnt afford to pay and had to get there metor in and im still paying it back the rates are ridiculous i cant wait to finish with them so i can change ASAP
